name: @cto.af/http-headers
decription: Parse HTTP headers from RFC 9110 (and others) using the full ABNF
author: Joe Hildebrand <joe-github@cursive.net>

scripts.abnf: abnf_gen -c src/original.abnf src/rfc9110.abnf src/rfc9111.abnf src/rfc3986.abnf src/rfc4647.abnf src/rfc5646.abnf src/rfc5322.abnf src/rfc6797.abnf src/rfc7639.abnf src/rfc7838.abnf src/rfc6265.abnf src/rfc8941.abnf src/rfc8942.abnf src/CSP.abnf -s Headers -s Headers-Loose
scripts.parser: peggy -c peggy.config.js && mkdir -p lib && cat src/types.d.ts src/index.d.ts > lib/index.d.ts && cp src/index.js lib
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run lint && npm pack --dry-run
